 137	 showMenu = false
 138	 onNavigateToProfile()
 139	 },
 140	 modifier = Modifier
 141	 .padding(horizontal = 8.dp, vertical = 2.dp)
 142	 .clip(RoundedCornerShape(12.dp))
 143	 )

 146	 DropdownMenuItem(

 150	 title = "Quá trình học",

 152	 )
 153	 },
 154	 onClick = {
 155	 showMenu = false
 156	 // Refresh current page - no navigation
 157	 },
 158	 modifier = Modifier
 159	 .padding(horizontal = 8.dp, vertical = 2.dp)
 160	 .clip(RoundedCornerShape(12.dp))
 161	 )
 162	
 163	 // 3. Cài đặt chung
 164	 DropdownMenuItem(

 249	@Composable
 250	fun StudyProgressTable(studyProgress: StudyProgress?) {
 251	 Column(
 252	 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 253	 ) {
 254	 // Header với gradient background
 255	 Box(
 256	 modifier = Modifier
 257	 .fillMaxWidth()
 258	 .background(
 259	 brush = androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Brush.horizontalGradient(
 260	 colors = listOf(
 261	 Color(0xFF0066B3),
 262	 Color(0xFF4A90E2)
 263	 )
 264	 ),
 265	 shape = RoundedCornerShape(topStart = 16.dp, topEnd = 16.dp)
 266	 )
 267	 .padding(20.dp)
 268	 ) {
 269	 Text(
 270	 text = "Thông Tin Lớp Học",
 271	 fontSize = 18.sp,
 272	 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 273	 color = Color.White,
 274	 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 275	 textAlign = TextAlign.Center
 276	 )
 277	 }
 278	
 279	 // Content với padding đẹp
 280	 Column(
 281	 modifier = Modifier
 282	 .fillMaxWidth()
 283	 .padding(24.dp)
 284	 ) {
 285	 // Các hàng của bảng với thiết kế chuyên nghiệp
 286	 TableRowItem(
 287	 label = "STT",
 288	 value = "1"
 289	 )
 290	
 291	 TableRowItem(
 292	 label = "Khóa học",
 293	 value = studyProgress?.courseCode ?: ""
 294	 )
 295	
 296	 TableRowItem(
 297	 label = "Ngày khai giảng",
 298	 value = studyProgress?.startDate ?: ""
 299	 )
 300	
 301	 TableRowItem(
 302	 label = "Lớp",
 303	 value = studyProgress?.className ?: ""
 304	 )
 305	
 306	 TableRowItem(
 307	 label = "Phòng học",
 308	 value = studyProgress?.room ?: ""
 309	 )
 310	
 311	 TableRowItem(
 312	 label = "Lịch học",
 313	 value = studyProgress?.schedule ?: ""
 314	 )
 315	
 316	 TableRowItem(
 317	 label = "Giảng viên",
 318	 value = studyProgress?.teacher ?: ""
 319	 )
 320	
 321	 TableRowItem(
 322	 label = "Trạng thái",
 323	 value = studyProgress?.note ?: "",
 324	 isStatus = true
 325	 )
 326	
 327	 // Thêm spacer cuối để đảm bảo có thể cuộn hết
 328	 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(20.dp))
 329	 }
 330	 }
 331	}
 332	
 333	@Composable
 334	fun TableRowItem(
 335	 label: String,
 336	 value: String,
 337	 isStatus: Boolean = false
 338	) {
 339	 Card(
 340	 modifier = Modifier
 341	 .fillMaxWidth()
 342	 .padding(vertical = 4.dp),
 343	 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
 344	 containerColor = Color.White
 345	 ),
 346	 elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 3.dp),
 347	 shape = RoundedCornerShape(12.dp),
 348	 border = androidx.compose.foundation.BorderStroke(
 349	 width = 1.dp,
 350	 color = Color(0xFFE5E7EB)
 351	 )
 352	 ) {
 353	 Row(
 354	 modifier = Modifier
 355	 .fillMaxWidth()
 356	 .background(
 357	 brush = androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Brush.horizontalGradient(
 358	 colors = listOf(
 359	 Color(0xFFFAFBFC),
 360	 Color.White
 361	 )
 362	 )
 363	 )
 364	 .padding(16.dp),
 365	 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.SpaceBetween,
 366	 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 367	 ) {
 368	 // Label với màu đẹp
 369	 Text(
 370	 text = label,
 371	 fontSize = 15.sp,
 372	 fontWeight = FontWeight.SemiBold,
 373	 color = Color(0xFF374151),
 374	 modifier = Modifier.weight(1f)
 375	 )
 376	
 377	 // Value với styling đặc biệt
 378	 if (value.isNotEmpty()) {
 379	 if (isStatus) {
 380	 // Status chip cho trạng thái
 381	 val (backgroundColor, textColor) = when {
 382	 value.contains("Đang học") -> Pair(Color(0xFF10B981), Color.White)
 383	 value.contains("Chưa đăng ký") -> Pair(Color(0xFFF59E0B), Color.White)
 384	 value.contains("Sắp mở") -> Pair(Color(0xFF3B82F6), Color.White)
 385	 else -> Pair(Color(0xFF6B7280), Color.White)
 386	 }
 387	
 388	 Surface(
 389	 color = backgroundColor,
 390	 shape = RoundedCornerShape(20.dp),
 391	 modifier = Modifier.padding(start = 8.dp)
 392	 ) {
 393	 Text(
 394	 text = value,
 395	 fontSize = 13.sp,
 396	 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 397	 color = textColor,
 398	 modifier = Modifier.padding(horizontal = 12.dp, vertical = 6.dp)
 399	 )
 400	 }
 401	 } else {
 402	 Text(
 403	 text = value,
 404	 fontSize = 15.sp,
 405	 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 406	 color = Color(0xFF111827),
 407	 textAlign = TextAlign.End,
 408	 modifier = Modifier.weight(1f)
 409	 )
 410	 }
 411	 } else {
 412	 // Empty state với style đẹp
 413	 Text(
 414	 text = "Chưa có thông tin",
 415	 fontSize = 14.sp,
 416	 color = Color(0xFF9CA3AF),
 417	 fontStyle = androidx.compose.ui.text.font.FontStyle.Italic,
 418	 modifier = Modifier.weight(1f),
 419	 textAlign = TextAlign.End
 420	 )
 421	 }
 422	 }
 423	 }
 424	}

 249	@Composable
 250	fun StudyProgressTable(studyProgress: StudyProgress?) {
 251	 Column(
 252	 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 253	 ) {
 254	 // Header với gradient background
 255	 Box(
 256	 modifier = Modifier
 257	 .fillMaxWidth()
 258	 .background(
 259	 brush = androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Brush.horizontalGradient(
 260	 colors = listOf(
 261	 Color(0xFF0066B3),
 262	 Color(0xFF4A90E2)
 263	 )
 264	 ),
 265	 shape = RoundedCornerShape(topStart = 16.dp, topEnd = 16.dp)
 266	 )
 267	 .padding(20.dp)
 268	 ) {
 269	 Text(
 270	 text = "Thông Tin Lớp Học",
 271	 fontSize = 18.sp,
 272	 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 273	 color = Color.White,
 274	 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 275	 textAlign = TextAlign.Center
 276	 )
 277	 }
 278	
 279	 // Content với padding đẹp
 280	 Column(
 281	 modifier = Modifier
 282	 .fillMaxWidth()
 283	 .padding(24.dp)
 284	 ) {
 285	 // Các hàng của bảng với thiết kế chuyên nghiệp
 286	 TableRowItem(
 287	 label = "STT",
 288	 value = "1"
 289	 )
 290	
 291	 TableRowItem(
 292	 label = "Khóa học",
 293	 value = studyProgress?.courseCode ?: ""
 294	 )
 295	
 296	 TableRowItem(
 297	 label = "Ngày khai giảng",
 298	 value = studyProgress?.startDate ?: ""
 299	 )
 300	
 301	 TableRowItem(
 302	 label = "Lớp",
 303	 value = studyProgress?.className ?: ""
 304	 )
 305	
 306	 TableRowItem(
 307	 label = "Phòng học",
 308	 value = studyProgress?.room ?: ""
 309	 )
 310	
 311	 TableRowItem(
 312	 label = "Lịch học",
 313	 value = studyProgress?.schedule ?: ""
 314	 )
 315	
 316	 TableRowItem(
 317	 label = "Giảng viên",
 318	 value = studyProgress?.teacher ?: ""
 319	 )
 320	
 321	 TableRowItem(
 322	 label = "Trạng thái",
 323	 value = studyProgress?.note ?: "",
 324	 isStatus = true
 325	 )
 326	
 327	 // Thêm spacer cuối để đảm bảo có thể cuộn hết
 328	 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(20.dp))
 329	 }
 330	 }
 331	
 332	 // Dialog xác nhận đăng xuất
 333	 if (showLogoutDialog) {
 334	 LogoutConfirmationDialog(
 335	 onDismiss = { showLogoutDialog = false },
 336	 onConfirm = {
 337	 showLogoutDialog = false
 338	 onLogout()
 339	 }
 340	 )
 341	 }
 342	}

 344	@Composable
 345	fun TableRowItem(
 346	 label: String,
 347	 value: String,
 348	 isStatus: Boolean = false
 349	) {
 350	 Card(
 351	 modifier = Modifier
 352	 .fillMaxWidth()
 353	 .padding(vertical = 4.dp),
 354	 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
 355	 containerColor = Color.White
 356	 ),
 357	 elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 3.dp),
 358	 shape = RoundedCornerShape(12.dp),
 359	 border = androidx.compose.foundation.BorderStroke(
 360	 width = 1.dp,
 361	 color = Color(0xFFE5E7EB)
 362	 )
 363	 ) {
 364	 Row(
 365	 modifier = Modifier
 366	 .fillMaxWidth()
 367	 .background(
 368	 brush = androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Brush.horizontalGradient(
 369	 colors = listOf(
 370	 Color(0xFFFAFBFC),
 371	 Color.White
 372	 )
 373	 )
 374	 )
 375	 .padding(16.dp),
 376	 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.SpaceBetween,
 377	 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 378	 ) {
 379	 // Label với màu đẹp
 380	 Text(
 381	 text = label,
 382	 fontSize = 15.sp,
 383	 fontWeight = FontWeight.SemiBold,
 384	 color = Color(0xFF374151),
 385	 modifier = Modifier.weight(1f)
 386	 )
 387	
 388	 // Value với styling đặc biệt
 389	 if (value.isNotEmpty()) {
 390	 if (isStatus) {
 391	 // Status chip cho trạng thái
 392	 val (backgroundColor, textColor) = when {
 393	 value.contains("Đang học") -> Pair(Color(0xFF10B981), Color.White)
 394	 value.contains("Chưa đăng ký") -> Pair(Color(0xFFF59E0B), Color.White)
 395	 value.contains("Sắp mở") -> Pair(Color(0xFF3B82F6), Color.White)
 396	 else -> Pair(Color(0xFF6B7280), Color.White)
 397	 }
 398	
 399	 Surface(
 400	 color = backgroundColor,
 401	 shape = RoundedCornerShape(20.dp),
 402	 modifier = Modifier.padding(start = 8.dp)
 403	 ) {
 404	 Text(
 405	 text = value,
 406	 fontSize = 13.sp,
 407	 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 408	 color = textColor,
 409	 modifier = Modifier.padding(horizontal = 12.dp, vertical = 6.dp)
 410	 )
 411	 }
 412	 } else {
 413	 Text(
 414	 text = value,
 415	 fontSize = 15.sp,
 416	 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 417	 color = Color(0xFF111827),
 418	 textAlign = TextAlign.End,
 419	 modifier = Modifier.weight(1f)
 420	 )
 421	 }
 422	 } else {
 423	 // Empty state với style đẹp
 424	 Text(
 425	 text = "Chưa có thông tin",
 426	 fontSize = 14.sp,
 427	 color = Color(0xFF9CA3AF),
 428	 fontStyle = androidx.compose.ui.text.font.FontStyle.Italic,
 429	 modifier = Modifier.weight(1f),
 430	 textAlign = TextAlign.End
 431	 )
 432	 }
 433	 }
 434	 }
 435	}

 437	// Component tái sử dụng cho menu item trong StudyProgress
 438	@Composable
 439	fun StudyProgressMenuItemContent(
 440	 icon: androidx.compose.ui.graphics.vector.ImageVector,
 441	 title: String,
 442	 iconColor: Color,
 443	 titleColor: Color = Color.Black
 444	) {
 445	 Row(
 446	 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically,
 447	 modifier = Modifier
 448	 .fillMaxWidth()
 449	 .padding(vertical = 4.dp)
 450	 ) {
 451	 // Icon với background gradient
 452	 Box(
 453	 modifier = Modifier
 454	 .size(42.dp)
 455	 .background(
 456	 brush = androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Brush.radialGradient(
 457	 colors = listOf(
 458	 iconColor.copy(alpha = 0.15f),
 459	 iconColor.copy(alpha = 0.05f)
 460	 )
 461	 ),
 462	 shape = CircleShape
 463	 ),
 464	 contentAlignment = Alignment.Center
 465	 ) {
 466	 Icon(
 467	 imageVector = icon,
 468	 contentDescription = title,
 469	 tint = iconColor,
 470	 modifier = Modifier.size(22.dp)
 471	 )
 472	 }
 473	
 474	 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.width(14.dp))

 356	@Composable
 357	fun SettingsSection(
 358	 title: String,
 359	 icon: ImageVector,
 360	 content: @Composable ColumnScope.() -> Unit
 361	) {
 362	 Card(
 363	 modifier = Modifier
 364	 .fillMaxWidth()
 365	 .padding(horizontal = 16.dp),
 366	 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(containerColor = Color.White),
 367	 elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 4.dp),
 368	 shape = RoundedCornerShape(12.dp)
 369	 ) {
 370	 Column(
 371	 modifier = Modifier.padding(16.dp)
 372	 ) {
 373	 // Section header
 374	 Row(
 375	 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically,
 376	 modifier = Modifier.padding(bottom = 16.dp)
 377	 ) {
 378	 Icon(
 379	 imageVector = icon,
 380	 contentDescription = title,
 381	 tint = Color(0xFF0066B3),
 382	 modifier = Modifier.size(24.dp)
 383	 )
 384	 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.width(8.dp))
 385	 Text(
 386	 text = title.uppercase(),
 387	 style = MaterialTheme.typography.titleMedium,
 388	 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 389	 color = Color(0xFF0066B3)
 390	 )
 391	 }
 392	 
 393	 Divider(modifier = Modifier.padding(bottom = 16.dp))
 394	 
 395	 content()
 396	 }
 397	 }
 398	}
 399	
 400	@Composable
 401	fun SwitchSettingItem(
 402	 title: String,
 403	 subtitle: String,
 404	 icon: ImageVector,
 405	 isChecked: Boolean,
 406	 onCheckedChange: (Boolean) -> Unit,
 407	 enabled: Boolean = true
 408	) {
 409	 Row(
 410	 modifier = Modifier
 411	 .fillMaxWidth()
 412	 .padding(vertical = 8.dp),
 413	 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 414	 ) {
 415	 Icon(
 416	 imageVector = icon,
 417	 contentDescription = title,
 418	 tint = if (enabled) Color.Gray else Color.Gray.copy(alpha = 0.5f),
 419	 modifier = Modifier.size(20.dp)
 420	 )
 421	 
 422	 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.width(16.dp))
 423	 
 424	 Column(
 425	 modifier = Modifier.weight(1f)
 426	 ) {
 427	 Text(
 428	 text = title,
 429	 fontSize = 16.sp,
 430	 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 431	 color = if (enabled) Color.Black else Color.Gray
 432	 )
 433	 Text(
 434	 text = subtitle,
 435	 fontSize = 14.sp,
 436	 color = Color.Gray
 437	 )
 438	 }
 439	 
 440	 Switch(
 441	 checked = isChecked,
 442	 onCheckedChange = onCheckedChange,
 443	 enabled = enabled,
 444	 colors = SwitchDefaults.colors(
 445	 checkedThumbColor = Color(0xFF4CAF50),
 446	 checkedTrackColor = Color(0xFF4CAF50).copy(alpha = 0.5f)
 447	 )
 448	 )
 449	 }
 450	}

 453	fun ClickableSettingItem(
 454	 title: String,
 455	 subtitle: String,
 456	 icon: ImageVector,
 457	 onClick: () -> Unit
 458	) {
 459	 Row(
 460	 modifier = Modifier
 461	 .fillMaxWidth()

 465	 ) {
 466	 Icon(

 471	 )
 472

 474

 477	 ) {
 478	 Text(
 479	 text = title,
 480	 fontSize = 16.sp,
 481	 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 482	 color = Color.Black
 483	 )
 484	 Text(

 488	 )

 502	fun SettingsMenuItemContent(

 504	 title: String,
 505	 iconColor: Color,
 506	 titleColor: Color = Color.Black

 365	@Composable
 366	fun SettingsSection(
 367	 title: String,
 368	 icon: ImageVector,
 369	 content: @Composable ColumnScope.() -> Unit
 370	) {
 371	 Card(
 372	 modifier = Modifier
 373	 .fillMaxWidth()
 374	 .padding(horizontal = 16.dp),
 375	 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(containerColor = Color.White),
 376	 elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 4.dp),
 377	 shape = RoundedCornerShape(12.dp)
 378	 ) {
 379	 Column(
 380	 modifier = Modifier.padding(16.dp)
 381	 ) {
 382	 // Section header
 383	 Row(
 384	 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically,
 385	 modifier = Modifier.padding(bottom = 16.dp)
 386	 ) {
 387	 Icon(
 388	 imageVector = icon,
 389	 contentDescription = title,
 390	 tint = Color(0xFF0066B3),
 391	 modifier = Modifier.size(24.dp)
 392	 )
 393	 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.width(8.dp))
 394	 Text(
 395	 text = title.uppercase(),
 396	 style = MaterialTheme.typography.titleMedium,
 397	 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 398	 color = Color(0xFF0066B3)
 399	 )
 400	 }
 401	 
 402	 Divider(modifier = Modifier.padding(bottom = 16.dp))
 403	 
 404	 content()
 405	 }
 406	 }
 407	}
 408	
 409	@Composable
 410	fun SwitchSettingItem(
 411	 title: String,
 412	 subtitle: String,
 413	 icon: ImageVector,
 414	 isChecked: Boolean,
 415	 onCheckedChange: (Boolean) -> Unit,
 416	 enabled: Boolean = true
 417	) {
 418	 Row(
 419	 modifier = Modifier
 420	 .fillMaxWidth()
 421	 .padding(vertical = 8.dp),
 422	 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 423	 ) {
 424	 Icon(
 425	 imageVector = icon,
 426	 contentDescription = title,
 427	 tint = if (enabled) Color.Gray else Color.Gray.copy(alpha = 0.5f),
 428	 modifier = Modifier.size(20.dp)
 429	 )
 430	 
 431	 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.width(16.dp))
 432	 
 433	 Column(
 434	 modifier = Modifier.weight(1f)
 435	 ) {
 436	 Text(
 437	 text = title,
 438	 fontSize = 16.sp,
 439	 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 440	 color = if (enabled) Color.Black else Color.Gray
 441	 )
 442	 Text(
 443	 text = subtitle,
 444	 fontSize = 14.sp,
 445	 color = Color.Gray
 446	 )
 447	 }
 448	 
 449	 Switch(
 450	 checked = isChecked,
 451	 onCheckedChange = onCheckedChange,
 452	 enabled = enabled,
 453	 colors = SwitchDefaults.colors(
 454	 checkedThumbColor = Color(0xFF4CAF50),
 455	 checkedTrackColor = Color(0xFF4CAF50).copy(alpha = 0.5f)
 456	 )
 457	 )
 458	 }
 459	}
 460	
 461	@Composable
 462	fun ClickableSettingItem(
 463	 title: String,
 464	 subtitle: String,
 465	 icon: ImageVector,
 466	 onClick: () -> Unit
 467	) {
 468	 Row(
 469	 modifier = Modifier
 470	 .fillMaxWidth()
 471	 .clickable { onClick() }
 472	 .padding(vertical = 8.dp),
 473	 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 474	 ) {
 475	 Icon(
 476	 imageVector = icon,
 477	 contentDescription = title,
 478	 tint = Color.Gray,
 479	 modifier = Modifier.size(20.dp)
 480	 )
 481	 
 482	 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.width(16.dp))
 483	 
 484	 Column(
 485	 modifier = Modifier.weight(1f)
 486	 ) {
 487	 Text(
 488	 text = title,
 489	 fontSize = 16.sp,
 490	 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium,
 491	 color = Color.Black
 492	 )
 493	 Text(
 494	 text = subtitle,
 495	 fontSize = 14.sp,
 496	 color = Color.Gray
 497	 )
 498	 }
 499	 
 500	 Icon(
 501	 imageVector = Icons.AutoMirrored.Filled.KeyboardArrowRight,
 502	 contentDescription = "Mở",
 503	 tint = Color.Gray,
 504	 modifier = Modifier.size(20.dp)
 505	 )
 506	 }
 507	}

 509	// Component tái sử dụng cho menu item trong Settings
 510	@Composable
 511	fun SettingsMenuItemContent(
 512	 icon: androidx.compose.ui.graphics.vector.ImageVector,
 513	 title: String,
 514	 iconColor: Color,
 515	 titleColor: Color = Color.Black
 516	) {
 517	 Row(
 518	 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically,
 519	 modifier = Modifier
 520	 .fillMaxWidth()
 521	 .padding(vertical = 4.dp)
 522	 ) {
 523	 // Icon với background gradient
 524	 Box(
 525	 modifier = Modifier
 526	 .size(42.dp)
 527	 .background(
 528	 brush = androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Brush.radialGradient(
 529	 colors = listOf(
 530	 iconColor.copy(alpha = 0.15f),
 531	 iconColor.copy(alpha = 0.05f)
 532	 )
 533	 ),
 534	 shape = CircleShape
 535	 ),
 536	 contentAlignment = Alignment.Center
 537	 ) {
 538	 Icon(
 539	 imageVector = icon,
 540	 contentDescription = title,
 541	 tint = iconColor,
 542	 modifier = Modifier.size(22.dp)
 543	 )
 544	 }
 545	
 546	 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.width(14.dp))
 547	
 548	 // Text content
 549	 Column(
 550	 modifier = Modifier.weight(1f)
 551	 ) {
 552	 Text(
 553	 text = title,
 554	 color = titleColor,
 555	 fontWeight = FontWeight.SemiBold,
 556	 fontSize = 15.sp,
 557	 lineHeight = 18.sp
 558	 )
 559	 }
 560	 }
 561	}

 19	##############################################################################
 20	##
 21	## Gradle start up script for UN*X
 22	##
 23	##############################################################################
 24	
 25	# Attempt to set APP_HOME
 26	# Resolve links: $0 may be a link
 27	PRG="$0"
 28	# Need this for relative symlinks.
 29	while [ -h "$PRG" ] ; do
 30	 ls=`ls -ld "$PRG"`
 31	 link=`expr "$ls" : '.*-> \(.*\)$'`
 32	 if expr "$link" : '/.*' > /dev/null; then
 33	 PRG="$link"
 34	 else
 35	 PRG=`dirname "$PRG"`"/$link"
 36	 fi
 37	done
 38	SAVED="`pwd`"
 39	cd "`dirname \"$PRG\"`/" >/dev/null
 40	APP_HOME="`pwd -P`"
 41	cd "$SAVED" >/dev/null
 42	
 43	APP_NAME="Gradle"
 44	APP_BASE_NAME=`basename "$0"`

 82	
 83	CLASSPATH=$APP_HOME/gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.jar
 84	
 85	
 86	# Determine the Java command to use to start the JVM.
 87	if [ -n "$JAVA_HOME" ] ; then
 88	 if [ -x "$JAVA_HOME/jre/sh/java" ] ; then
 89	 # IBM's JDK on AIX uses strange locations for the executables
 90	 JAVACMD="$JAVA_HOME/jre/sh/java"
 91	 else
 92	 JAVACMD="$JAVA_HOME/bin/java"
 93	 fi
 94	 if [ ! -x "$JAVACMD" ] ; then
 95	 die "ERROR: JAVA_HOME is set to an invalid directory: $JAVA_HOME
 96	
 97	Please set the JAVA_HOME variable in your environment to match the
 98	location of your Java installation."
 99	 fi
 100	else
 101	 JAVACMD="java"
 102	 which java >/dev/null 2>&1 || die "ERROR: JAVA_HOME is not set and no 'java' command could be found in your PATH.
 103	
 104	Please set the JAVA_HOME variable in your environment to match the
 105	location of your Java installation."
 106	fi
 107	
 108	# Increase the maximum file descriptors if we can.
 109	if [ "$cygwin" = "false" -a "$darwin" = "false" -a "$nonstop" = "false" ] ; then
 110	 MAX_FD_LIMIT=`ulimit -H -n`
 111	 if [ $? -eq 0 ] ; then
 112	 if [ "$MAX_FD" = "maximum" -o "$MAX_FD" = "max" ] ; then
 113	 MAX_FD="$MAX_FD_LIMIT"
 114	 fi
 115	 ulimit -n $MAX_FD
 116	 if [ $? -ne 0 ] ; then
 117	 warn "Could not set maximum file descriptor limit: $MAX_FD"
 118	 fi
 119	 else
 120	 warn "Could not query maximum file descriptor limit: $MAX_FD_LIMIT"
 121	 fi
 122	fi
 123	
 124	# For Darwin, add options to specify how the application appears in the dock

 126	 GRADLE_OPTS="$GRADLE_OPTS \"-Xdock:name=$APP_NAME\" \"-Xdock:icon=$APP_HOME/media/gradle.icns\""
 127	fi

 52	 CourseSchedule("21_KH090", "28/10/2023", "A2", "Tối - Thứ 2,4,6", "Học tại trường"),

 54	 CourseSchedule("21_KH090", "28/10/2023", "A2", "Sáng - Thứ 7-CN", "Học tại trường"),
 55	 CourseSchedule("21_KH090", "28/10/2023", "A3", "Chiều - Thứ 7-CN", "Học tại trường"),
 56	 CourseSchedule("21_KH090", "28/10/2023", "LT2/6", "Chiều - Thứ 7-CN", "Học tại trường"),
 57	 CourseSchedule("21_KH090", "28/10/2023", "LT2/6", "Sáng - Thứ 2,4,6", "Học tại trường"),
 58	 CourseSchedule("21_KH090", "28/10/2023", "LT2/6", "Sáng - Thứ 3,4,6", "Học tại trường"),
 59	 CourseSchedule("21_KH090", "28/10/2023", "LT2/6", "Chiều - Thứ 2,4,6", "Học tại trường", true)
 60	 )
 61	 )
 62	 }

 64	 Scaffold(

 118	 SchoolHeader()

 121	 CourseScheduleSection(

 134	fun SchoolHeader() {
 135	 Card(

 165	 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,

 178	 fontSize = 11.sp,

 188	fun CourseScheduleSection(

 191	) {
 192	 Column(

 194	 .fillMaxWidth()

 207	 Card(
 208	 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 209	 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(containerColor = Color.White),
 210	 elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 4.dp),
 211	 shape = RoundedCornerShape(12.dp),
 212	 border = androidx.compose.foundation.BorderStroke(1.dp, Color(0xFFE0E0E0))
 213	 ) {
 214	 Column {
 215	 // Header của bảng
 216	 CourseTableHeader()
 217	 
 218	 // Danh sách khóa học
 219	 courseList.forEach { course ->
 220	 CourseTableRow(
 221	 course = course,
 222	 onSelected = { onCourseSelected(course) }

 224	 }
 225	 }
 226	 }
 227	 }
 228	}

 321	@Composable
 322	fun CourseTableRow(
 323	 course: CourseSchedule,
 324	 onSelected: () -> Unit
 325	) {
 326	 val backgroundColor = if (course.isSelected) Color(0xFFFFF3E0) else Color.White // Màu cam nhẹ
 327	 val borderColor = if (course.isSelected) Color(0xFFFF9800) else Color(0xFFE0E0E0) // Màu cam đậm hơn
 328	
 329	 Row(
 330	 modifier = Modifier
 331	 .background(backgroundColor)
 332	 .border(
 333	 width = if (course.isSelected) 2.dp else 1.dp,
 334	 color = borderColor
 335	 )
 336	 .padding(vertical = 12.dp, horizontal = 8.dp), // Tăng padding vertical để canh đều
 337	 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(1.dp),
 338	 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically // Canh giữa theo chiều dọc
 339	 ) {
 340	 // Cột 1: Chọn lớp (với RadioButton)
 341	 TableDataCellWithRadio(
 342	 text = course.level,
 343	 width = 120.dp,
 344	 isSelected = course.isSelected,
 345	 onSelected = onSelected
 346	 )
 347	
 348	 // Cột 2: Buổi học
 349	 TableDataCell(
 350	 text = course.schedule,
 351	 width = 160.dp,
 352	 isSelected = course.isSelected
 353	 )
 354	
 355	 // Cột 3: Khóa
 356	 TableDataCell(
 357	 text = course.courseCode,
 358	 width = 120.dp,
 359	 isSelected = course.isSelected
 360	 )
 361	
 362	 // Cột 4: Ghi chú
 363	 TableDataCell(
 364	 text = course.notes,
 365	 width = 180.dp,
 366	 isSelected = course.isSelected
 367	 )
 368	 }
 369	}

 435	@Composable
 436	fun RegistrationButton(
 437	 isEnabled: Boolean,
 438	 selectedCourse: CourseSchedule?,
 439	 onRegisterClick: () -> Unit
 440	) {
 441	 Column(
 442	 modifier = Modifier
 443	 .fillMaxWidth()
 444	 .padding(16.dp)
 445	 ) {
 446	 // Thông tin khóa học được chọn - chỉ hiển thị khi có lựa chọn
 447	 if (selectedCourse != null) {
 448	 Card(
 449	 modifier = Modifier
 450	 .fillMaxWidth()
 451	 .padding(bottom = 16.dp),
 452	 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(containerColor = Color(0xFFFFF3E0)),
 453	 elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 2.dp),
 454	 shape = RoundedCornerShape(8.dp)
 455	 ) {
 456	 Column(
 457	 modifier = Modifier.padding(16.dp)
 458	 ) {
 459	 Text(
 460	 text = "Khóa học đã chọn:",
 461	 fontSize = 14.sp,
 462	 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 463	 color = Color(0xFFFF9800)
 464	 )
 465	 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(8.dp))
 466	 Text(
 467	 text = "Lớp: ${selectedCourse.level}",
 468	 fontSize = 13.sp,
 469	 color = Color.Black
 470	 )
 471	 Text(
 472	 text = "Buổi học: ${selectedCourse.schedule}",
 473	 fontSize = 13.sp,
 474	 color = Color.Black
 475	 )
 476	 Text(
 477	 text = "Khóa: ${selectedCourse.courseCode}",
 478	 fontSize = 13.sp,
 479	 color = Color.Black
 480	 )
 481	 Text(
 482	 text = "Ghi chú: ${selectedCourse.notes}",
 483	 fontSize = 13.sp,
 484	 color = Color.Black
 485	 )
 486	 }
 487	 }
 488	 } else {
 489	 // Hiển thị thông báo khi chưa chọn khóa học
 490	 Card(
 491	 modifier = Modifier
 492	 .fillMaxWidth()
 493	 .padding(bottom = 16.dp),
 494	 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(containerColor = Color(0xFFF5F5F5)),
 495	 elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 2.dp),
 496	 shape = RoundedCornerShape(8.dp)
 497	 ) {
 498	 Box(
 499	 modifier = Modifier
 500	 .fillMaxWidth()
 501	 .padding(16.dp),
 502	 contentAlignment = Alignment.Center
 503	 ) {
 504	 Text(
 505	 text = "Vui lòng chọn khóa học từ bảng trên",
 506	 fontSize = 14.sp,
 507	 color = Color.Gray,
 508	 textAlign = TextAlign.Center
 509	 )
 510	 }
 511	 }
 512	 }
 513	
 514	 // Button đăng ký - chỉ hoạt động khi đã chọn
 515	 Button(
 516	 onClick = onRegisterClick,
 517	 enabled = isEnabled,
 518	 modifier = Modifier
 519	 .fillMaxWidth()
 520	 .height(50.dp),
 521	 shape = RoundedCornerShape(8.dp),
 522	 colors = ButtonDefaults.buttonColors(
 523	 containerColor = if (isEnabled) Color(0xFFFF9800) else Color.Gray,
 524	 disabledContainerColor = Color.Gray
 525	 ),
 526	 elevation = ButtonDefaults.buttonElevation(
 527	 defaultElevation = if (isEnabled) 6.dp else 0.dp,
 528	 pressedElevation = 8.dp
 529	 )
 530	 ) {
 531	 Text(
 532	 text = if (isEnabled) "Đăng Ký Khóa Học" else "Vui lòng chọn khóa học",
 533	 fontSize = 16.sp,
 534	 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 535	 color = Color.White
 536	 )
 537	 }
 538	 }
 539	}
